statistics.name: gameProjection
statistics.description: Team's predicted win percentage in this game at time of given BPI run

statistics.name: winProbability
statistics.description: Team's predicted win percentage in this game at time of given BPI run.

statistics.name: starterAdjustment
statistics.description: Value by which to adjust the team's rating based on the team's starting pitcher.

statistics.name: bullpenAdjustment
statistics.description: Value by which to adjust the team's rating based on the team's bullpen.

statistics.name: battingAdjustment
statistics.description: Value by which to adjust the team's rating based on the team's batting.

statistics.name: parkAdjustment
statistics.description: Value by which to adjust the team's rating based on the park where the game is being played.
